snippet: The American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials said 23 states reported combined spending of more than $1 billion on winter maintenance operations.
abstract: American Assn of State Highway and Transportation Officials says 23 states reported combined spending of more than $1 billion on winter maintenance operations and eight million work hours plowing or treating state roads from October to March.
lead_paragraph: The American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials said 23 states reported combined spending of more than $1 billion on winter maintenance operations.

headline.main: States Spent Over $1 Billion on Winter Cleanup Operations
headline.print_headline: States Spent Over $1 Billion on Winter Cleanup Operations

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Assn of State Highway and Transportation Officials
